entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
